languages.text: {n}Охранник, коему выпал жребий нести мучительную вахту внутри очистителя воздуха, между работающим механизмом и свинцовым кожухом, заметил странную тень. Враг утратил осторожность и проявил себя. Подняв тревогу, отважный страж ранил тварь и погиб, но его товарищи обратили врага в бегство.{/n}

{n}The warden whose unfortunate lot it was to keep watch inside of an air purifier spotted a strange shadow right between the working mechanisms and the lead cover. The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave warden raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Охранник, коему выпал жребий нести мучительную вахту внутри очистителя воздуха, между работающим механизмом и свинцовым кожухом, заметил странную тень. Враг утратил осторожность и проявил себя. Подняв тревогу, отважный страж ранил тварь и погиб, но его товарищи обратили врага в бегство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The time paradoxes have stopped, and the world had started to recover slowly. And the Kasballica Mission reminded the von Valancius dynasty that they will return the favour in the future.{/n}
{n}The time paradoxes have stopped, and the world had started to recover slowly. And the Kasballica Mission reminded the von Valancius dynasty that they will return the favour in the future.{/n}

{n}The guard whose unfortunate lot it was to keep watch inside of an air purifier spotted a strange shadow right between the working mechanisms and the lead cover. The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave guard raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}

The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave guard raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}

The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave warden raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}

{n}The warden whose unfortunate lot it was to keep watch inside of an air purifier spotted a strange shadow right between the working mechanisms and the lead cover. The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave warden raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一位在空气净化间里值班的看守偶然发现：在运作的装置与机壳之间有个古怪的黑影。神秘的敌人一时粗心大意，暴露了自己的踪迹。这位勇敢的看守拉响警报，打伤了那个敌人，在战斗中英勇战死，但他的战友随即赶来，赶走了敌人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warden whose unfortunate lot it was to keep watch inside of an air purifier spotted a strange shadow right between the working mechanisms and the lead cover. The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave warden raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一位在空气净化间里值班的看守偶然发现：在运作的装置与机壳之间有个古怪的黑影。神秘的敌人一时粗心大意，暴露了自己的踪迹。这位勇敢的看守拉响警报，打伤了那个敌人，在战斗中英勇战死，但他的战友随即赶来，赶走了敌人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El guardia al que desgraciadamente le había tocado vigilar el interior de un purificador de aire vio una extraña sombra justo entre los engranajes y la cubierta de plomo. El enemigo se había descuidado y finalmente se dejó ver. El valiente guardia dio la alarma, hirió a la criatura y cayó en combate, pero sus compañeros consiguieron ahuyentar a la bestia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The guard whose unfortunate lot it was to keep watch inside of an air purifier spotted a strange shadow right between the working mechanisms and the lead cover. The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave guard raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El guardia al que desgraciadamente le había tocado vigilar el interior de un purificador de aire vio una extraña sombra justo entre los engranajes y la cubierta de plomo. El enemigo se había descuidado y finalmente se dejó ver. El valiente guardia dio la alarma, hirió a la criatura y cayó en combate, pero sus compañeros consiguieron ahuyentar a la bestia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}不運にも空気清浄機の内部を監視することになった護衛は、作動装置とリード・カバーの間に奇妙な影を見つけた。敵が油断し、ついに正体を現したのだ。勇敢な衛兵は警報を発し、獣に傷を負わせ、戦闘中に倒れたが、彼の仲間が獣を追い払うことに成功した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The guard whose unfortunate lot it was to keep watch inside of an air purifier spotted a strange shadow right between the working mechanisms and the lead cover. The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave guard raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不運にも空気清浄機の内部を監視することになった護衛は、作動装置とリード・カバーの間に奇妙な影を見つけた。敵が油断し、ついに正体を現したのだ。勇敢な衛兵は警報を発し、獣に傷を負わせ、戦闘中に倒れたが、彼の仲間が獣を追い払うことに成功した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un soldat, qui a la malchance de monter la garde à l'intérieur d'un purificateur d'air, repère une ombre étrange se glisser entre les mécanismes du moteur et son capot de plomb. Le monstre, devenu imprudent, est enfin découvert ! Le courageux soldat donne l'alerte, blesse la créature et meurt les armes à la main, mais ses compagnons parviennent à chasser la créature.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The guard whose unfortunate lot it was to keep watch inside of an air purifier spotted a strange shadow right between the working mechanisms and the lead cover. The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave guard raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un soldat, qui a la malchance de monter la garde à l'intérieur d'un purificateur d'air, repère une ombre étrange se glisser entre les mécanismes du moteur et son capot de plomb. Le monstre, devenu imprudent, est enfin découvert ! Le courageux soldat donne l'alerte, blesse la créature et meurt les armes à la main, mais ses compagnons parviennent à chasser la créature.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Wache, die das Pech hatte, in einem Luftreiniger Dienst zu schieben, entdeckte zwischen den aktiven Mechanismen und der Bleiabdeckung einen merkwürdigen Schatten. Der Feind war unvorsichtig geworden und hatte sich endlich gezeigt. Die mutige Wache schlug Alarm, verwundete die Kreatur und fiel im Kampf — doch seinen Kameraden gelang es, das Monstrum zu vertreiben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The guard whose unfortunate lot it was to keep watch inside of an air purifier spotted a strange shadow right between the working mechanisms and the lead cover. The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave guard raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Wache, die das Pech hatte, in einem Luftreiniger Dienst zu schieben, entdeckte zwischen den aktiven Mechanismen und der Bleiabdeckung einen merkwürdigen Schatten. Der Feind war unvorsichtig geworden und hatte sich endlich gezeigt. Die mutige Wache schlug Alarm, verwundete die Kreatur und fiel im Kampf — doch seinen Kameraden gelang es, das Monstrum zu vertreiben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir hava temizleyicinin içinde nöbet tutmakla görevlendirilen talihsiz dizdar, makinenin aksamlarıyla kurşundan kapağının arasında tuhaf bir gölge tespit etti. Düşman ihtiyatsız davranıp nihayet kendini belli etmişti. Yürekli dizdar alarmı çaldıktan sonra mahluku yaraladı ve son nefesini verdi. Fakat silah arkadaşları, canavarı kovalayıp kaçırmayı başardı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The warden whose unfortunate lot it was to keep watch inside of an air purifier spotted a strange shadow right between the working mechanisms and the lead cover. The enemy had grown careless and finally revealed itself. The brave warden raised the alarm, wounded the creature, and fell in battle, but his comrades managed to chase the beast away.{/n}
